trans-unit.source: The InnoDB Buffer Pool size can be set dynamically from MariaDB 10.2.2.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB Buffer Pool的大小可以从MariaDB 10.2.2开始动态设置。

trans-unit.source: The InnoDB Lock Monitor displays additional lock information.

trans-unit.source: The InnoDB Table Monitor is deprecated, and may be removed in a future version of MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB表监控器已被废弃,并可能在MariaDB的未来版本中被移除。

trans-unit.source: The InnoDB Tablespace Monitor is deprecated, and may be removed in a future version of MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB表空间监控器已被废弃,可能会在未来的MariaDB版本中被移除。

trans-unit.source: The InnoDB storage engine does not maintain internal row counts. Transactions isolate writes, which means that concurrent transactions will not have the same row counts.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB存储引擎不维护内部行数。事务隔离写入,这意味着并发事务不会有相同的行数。

trans-unit.source: The InnoDB storage engine has the following limitations.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB存储引擎有以下限制。

trans-unit.source: The InnoDB-specific Information Schema tables also contain information about the InnoDB foreign keys. The foreign key information is stored in the INNODB_SYS_FOREIGN. Data about the individual columns are stored in INNODB_SYS_FOREIGN_COLS.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB特定的信息架构表还包含有关InnoDB外键的信息。外键信息存储在 INNODB_SYS_FOREIGN 中。有关各个列的数据存储在 INNODB_SYS_FOREIGN_COLS 中。

trans-unit.source: The JDBC table type should be distributed with all recent versions of MariaDB. However, if the automatic compilation of it is possible after the java JDK was installed, the complete distribution of it is not fully implemented in older versions. The distributed JdbcInterface.jar file contains the JdbcInterface wrapper only. New versions distribute a JavaWrappers.jar that contains all currently existing wrappers.

trans-unit.target: JSON表类型在MariaDB 10.0.16中引入。

trans-unit.source: The JSON type in MySQL stores the JSON object in a compact form, not as LONGTEXT as in MariaDB. This means that row based replication will not work for JSON types from MySQL to MariaDB.

trans-unit.source: The JdbcInterface wrapper is always usable when Java is present on your machine. Binary distributions have this wrapper already compiled as a JdbcInterface.jar file installed in the plugin directory whose path is automatically included in the class path of the JVM. Therefore there is no need to worry about its path. Recent versions also add a JavaWrappers.jar that contains all wrappers.
trans-unit.target: 当你的机器上有Java的时候,JdbcInterface包装器总是可以使用的,二进制发行版已经将这个包装器编译成JdbcInterface.jar文件,安装在插件目录下,其路径自动包含在JVM的类路径中。二进制发行版已经将这个包装器编译成JdbcInterface.jar文件,安装在插件目录下,其路径自动包含在JVM的类路径中。因此不需要担心它的路径。最近的版本还增加了一个JavaWrappers.jar,其中包含了所有的包装程序。

trans-unit.source: The Kafka data adapter streams all messages published to Apache Kafka topics in Avro format to MariaDB AX automatically and continuously - enabling data from many sources to be streamed and collected for analysis without complex code. The Kafka adapter is built using librdkafka and the MariaDB ColumnStore bulk write SDK

trans-unit.source: The LOAD DATA INFILE statement reads rows from a text file into a table at a very high speed. The file name must be given as a literal string.
trans-unit.target: LOAD DATA INFILE语句以极快的速度从文本文件中读取行。文件名必须以字符串的形式给出。

trans-unit.source: The LOAD XML statement reads data from an XML file into a table. The file_name must be given as a literal string. The tagname in the optional ROWS IDENTIFIED BY clause must also be given as a literal string, and must be surrounded by angle brackets (< and >).
trans-unit.target: LOAD XML语句将数据从XML文件读取到表中。该 file_name 必须作为一个字符串。可选的ROWS IDENTIFIED BY子句中的 tagname 也必须以文字字符串形式给出，并且必须用尖括号（<和>）括起来。

trans-unit.source: The MEDIAN() window function was first introduced with in MariaDB 10.3.3.
trans-unit.target: MEDIAN（）窗口函数最初是在MariaDB 10.3.3中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The MEMORY storage engine permits indexes to be either B-tree or Hash. Hash is the default type for MEMORY. See Storage Engine index types for more on their characteristics.
trans-unit.target: MEMORY存储引擎允许索引为B树或哈希。哈希是MEMORY的默认类型。有关其特征的更多信息，请参见Storage Engine索引类型。

trans-unit.source: The MERGE storage engine, also known as the MRG_MyISAM engine, is a collection of identical MyISAM tables that can be used as one. "Identical" means that all tables have identical column and index information. You cannot merge MyISAM tables in which the columns are listed in a different order, do not have exactly the same columns, or have the indexes in different order. However, any or all of the MyISAM tables can be compressed with myisampack. Columns names and indexes names can be different, as long as data types and NULL/NOT NULL clauses are the same. Differences in table options such as AVG_ROW_LENGTH, MAX_ROWS, or PACK_KEYS do not matter.
trans-unit.target: MERGE存储引擎，也称为MRG_MyISAM引擎，是相同的MyISAM表的集合，可以用作一个表。 “相同”是指所有表具有相同的列和索引信息。您不能合并MyISAM表，这些表中的列以不同的顺序列出，没有完全相同的列或索引以不同的顺序排列。但是，可以使用myisampack压缩任何或所有MyISAM表。列名称和索引名称可以不同，只要数据类型和NULL / NOT NULL子句相同即可。表选项（例如AVG_ROW_LENGTH，MAX_ROWS或PACK_KEYS）的差异并不重要。

trans-unit.source: The MSI installer package requires property names to be all capitals and contain only English letters. By convention, for a boolean property, an empty value means "false" and a non-empty is "true".
trans-unit.target: MSI安装包要求属性名必须全部大写,并且只包含英文字母。按照惯例,对于一个布尔属性,空值表示 "false",非空值表示 "true"。

trans-unit.source: The MYSQL type uses similar methods than the ODBC type to implement the INSERT, UPDATE and DELETE commands. Refer to the ODBC chapter for the restrictions concerning them.
trans-unit.target: MYSQL类型使用与ODBC类型相似的方法来实现INSERT，UPDATE和DELETE命令。有关它们的限制，请参考ODBC章节。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB error log is not encrypted. The error log can contain query text and data in some cases, including crashes, assertion failures, and cases where InnoDB/XtraDB write monitor output to the log to aid in debugging. It can be sent to syslog too, if needed.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 错误日志未加密。在某些情况下，错误日志可能包含查询文本和数据，包括崩溃，断言失败以及InnoDB / XtraDB将监视器输出写入日志以帮助调试的情况。如果需要，它也可以发送到syslog。

trans-unit.target: MariaDB 源代码还包含一些身份验证插件，旨在明确地作为开发人员的示例。它们位于 plugin/auth_examples 中。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB ColumnStore AMI Instance uses 'iops' EBS storage for improved performance over the standard storage type. But it also means that based on the number of Instances/Module you plan to launch, you will need to check your account to make sure you have the permissions to create enough 'iops' storages. Amazon does have a limit on this.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore AMI实例使用'iops'EBS存储,以提高比标准存储类型的性能。但这也意味着,基于你计划启动的Instance/Module数量,你需要检查你的账户,以确保你有权限创建足够的'iops'存储。亚马逊确实有这方面的限制。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB ColumnStore AMI comes installed with the Amazon AWS-CLI Tool set package, version 1.11.36. The Amazon AWS-CLI Tools provides the capability to the MariaDB ColumnStore to create EC2 Instances and EBS storages. It allows allows for EC2 Instance/node failover, meaning if an EC2 Instance goes down or stops communicating, MariaDB ColumnStore will handle that problem keeping the system functional. This might consist of re-attaching an EBS storage device from the problem EC2 Performance Module to an another Performance Module in the system. Also if a EC2 Instance was to terminate, MariaDB ColumnStore will launch another EC2 Instance in its place.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore AMI 安装了 Amazon AWS-CLI 工具集包,版本为 1.11.36。Amazon AWS-CLI工具为MariaDB ColumnStore提供了创建EC2实例和EBS存储的能力。它允许允许EC2 Instance/节点故障转移,这意味着如果一个EC2 Instance宕机或停止通信,MariaDB ColumnStore将处理该问题,保持系统功能。这可能包括将EBS存储设备从问题EC2性能模块重新连接到系统中的另一个性能模块。另外,如果一个EC2 Instance要终止,MariaDB ColumnStore将启动另一个EC2 Instance来代替它。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB ColumnStore AMI is CentOS 7 based with MariaDB ColumnStore GA packages.

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB ColumnStore binary package can be installed from the MariaDB Downloads page. <CLICK> on the "all versions" link and then step down into the OS version to the bottom level directory where you will see 2 packages, one for rpm/deb and the other for the binary. Select the binary package to download.
trans-unit.target: 可以从MariaDB下载页面安装MariaDB ColumnStore二进制软件包。在“所有版本”链接上单击<CLICK>，然后进入操作系统版本，进入最低级别的目录，您将在其中看到2个软件包，一个用于rpm / deb，另一个用于二进制文件。选择要下载的二进制软件包。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB ColumnStore binary packages can be downloaded from https://downloads.mariadb.com/ColumnStore/. Select version 1.2.1, then navigate to the appropriate package for your system. The binary package will have the extension '.bin.tar.gz' rather than '.rpm.tar.gz' or '.deb.tar.gz'.
trans-unit.target: 可以从https://downloads.mariadb.com/ColumnStore/下载MariaDB ColumnStore二进制软件包。选择版本1.2.1，然后导航到适合您系统的软件包。二进制软件包的扩展名为“ .bin.tar.gz”，而不是“ .rpm.tar.gz”或“ .deb.tar.gz”。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB ColumnStore binary packages can be downloaded from https://downloads.mariadb.com/ColumnStore/. Select version 1.2.2, then navigate to the appropriate package for your system. The binary package will have the extension '.bin.tar.gz' rather than '.rpm.tar.gz' or '.deb.tar.gz'.
trans-unit.target: 可以从https://downloads.mariadb.com/ColumnStore/下载MariaDB ColumnStore二进制软件包。选择版本1.2.2，然后导航到适合您系统的软件包。二进制软件包的扩展名为“ .bin.tar.gz”，而不是“ .rpm.tar.gz”或“ .deb.tar.gz”。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB ColumnStore binary packages can be downloaded from https://downloads.mariadb.com/ColumnStore/. Select version 1.2.5, then navigate to the appropriate package for your system. The binary package will have the extension '.bin.tar.gz' rather than '.rpm.tar.gz' or '.deb.tar.gz'.
trans-unit.target: 可以从https://downloads.mariadb.com/ColumnStore/下载MariaDB ColumnStore二进制软件包。选择版本1.2.5，然后导航到适合您系统的软件包。二进制软件包的扩展名为“ .bin.tar.gz”，而不是“ .rpm.tar.gz”或“ .deb.tar.gz”。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB ColumnStore daemon uses port 3306.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore守护进程使用3306端口。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB ColumnStore daemon utilizes port 3306.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore守护进程使用3306端口。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB ColumnStore has 3 sets of database files. These files are also always backed up and restored together as part of the backup and restore process.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore有3套数据库文件。这些文件也总是作为备份和恢复过程的一部分一起备份和恢复。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB ColumnStore log files setup is done as part of the post-install/postConfigure installation process. If some some reason the MariaDB ColumnStore log files aren't being generated or the log-rotation is not working, then there might have been some install/setup error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore日志文件的设置是作为安装后/postConfigure安装过程的一部分。如果因为某些原因,MariaDB ColumnStore日志文件没有生成或者日志轮转不正常,那么可能是发生了一些安装/设置错误。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB ColumnStore logrotate file is located in
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore的logrotate文件位于

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB ColumnStore process corefiles would be stored in /var/log/mariadb/columnstore/corefiles, that is if core file dumping is enabled on the system.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore进程的corefiles将存储在/var/log/mariadb/columnstore/corefiles中,也就是说,如果系统中启用了核心文件转储功能,那么这个文件将被存储在/var/log/mariadb/columnstore中。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB ColumnStore uses TCP ports 3306, 8600 - 8630, 8700, and 8800. Port 3306 is the default port for clients to connect to the MariaDB server; the others are for internal communication and will need to be open between ColumnStore nodes.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore使用TCP端口3306、8600-8630、8700和8800。3306端口是客户端连接MariaDB服务器的默认端口,其他端口用于内部通信,ColumnStore节点之间需要打开。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB ColumnStore utilizes these ports 3306, 8600 - 8630, 8700, and 8800. So on multi-node installs, these ports will need to be accessible between the servers. So if there is any firewall software running on the system that could block these ports, either that firewall would need to be disabled as shown below or the ports listed above will need to be configured to allow both input and output on all servers within the firewall software. You will also want to allow these ports to be passed though on any routers that might be connected between the servers.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore利用了3306、8600-8630、8700和8800这些端口。所以在多节点安装中,这些端口需要在服务器之间进行访问。因此,如果系统上运行的防火墙软件可能会阻塞这些端口,则需要按照下图所示禁用该防火墙,或者需要将上面列出的端口配置为允许防火墙软件内所有服务器的输入和输出。你还需要允许这些端口在服务器之间可能连接的任何路由器上通过。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB Columnstore CentOS 7 binary package is installed in the user account:.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Columnstore CentOS 7二进制包安装在用户账号:。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB Foundation archives repositories of old minor releases at the following URL:
trans-unit.target: MariaDB基金会将旧的次要版本的存储库归档在以下网址。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB Foundation provides a MariaDB repository for several Linux distributions that use apt-get to manage packages. This repository contains software packages related to MariaDB Server, including the server itself, clients and utilities, client libraries, plugins, and Mariabackup. The MariaDB Repository Configuration Tool can easily generate the appropriate commands to add the repository for your distribution.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Foundation为多个使用 apt-get 管理软件包的Linux发行版提供了MariaDB存储库。该存储库包含与MariaDB Server相关的软件包，包括服务器本身，客户端和实用程序，客户端库，插件和Mariabackup。 MariaDB存储库配置工具可以轻松生成适当的命令以添加存储库以供您分发。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB Foundation provides a MariaDB repository for several Linux distributions that use yum to manage packages. This repository contains software packages related to MariaDB Server, including the server itself, clients and utilities, client libraries, plugins, and Mariabackup. The MariaDB Repository Configuration Tool can easily generate the appropriate configuration file to add the repository for your distribution.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Foundation为多个使用 yum 管理软件包的Linux发行版提供了MariaDB存储库。该存储库包含与MariaDB Server相关的软件包，包括服务器本身，客户端和实用程序，客户端库，插件和Mariabackup。 MariaDB存储库配置工具可以轻松生成适当的配置文件，以为您的发行版添加存储库。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB Foundation provides a MariaDB repository for several Linux distributions that use zypper to manage packages. This repository contains software packages related to MariaDB Server, including the server itself, clients and utilities, client libraries, plugins, and Mariabackup. The MariaDB Repository Configuration Tool can easily generate the appropriate commands to add the repository for your distribution.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Foundation为使用 zypper 来管理软件包的多个Linux发行版提供了MariaDB存储库。该存储库包含与MariaDB Server相关的软件包，包括服务器本身，客户端和实用程序，客户端库，插件和Mariabackup。 MariaDB存储库配置工具可以轻松地生成适当的命令来添加存储库以供您分发。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB GUI tool allows users to create and execute queries, develop and debug stored routines, automate database object management, and analyze table data via an intuitive interface. The MariaDB client provides utilities to compare schema and data and synchronize them. It includes data generating and database reporting tools, DB documenter, backup options with scheduling, and much more.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB GUI工具允许用户创建和执行查询,开发和调试存储例程,自动管理数据库对象,并通过直观的界面分析表数据。MariaDB客户端提供了比较模式和数据以及同步的实用工具。它包括数据生成和数据库报告工具、DB文档生成器、带调度的备份选项等。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB GUI tool allows users to create and execute queries, develop and debug stored routines, automate database object management, and analyze table data via an intuitive interface. The MariaDB client provides utilities to compare schema and data and synchronize them. It includes database reporting tools, backup options with scheduling, and much more.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB GUI工具允许用户创建和执行查询,开发和调试存储例程,自动管理数据库对象,并通过直观的界面分析表数据。MariaDB客户端提供了比较模式和数据以及同步它们的实用工具。它包括数据库报告工具、带有调度的备份选项等。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB MaxScale server configuration above designates data manipulation statements such as INSERT, UPDATE and DELETE as transactional and routes these statements to the MariaDB Servers. The other MaxScale server then streams the changes over to ColumnStore.
trans-unit.target: 上面的MariaDB MaxScale服务器配置将数据操作语句（例如 INSERT ， UPDATE 和 DELETE )指定为事务性的，并将这些语句路由到MariaDB服务器。然后，另一台MaxScale服务器将更改流式传输到ColumnStore。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB MaxScale server configuration above designates queries on tables other than bank.loan as transactional and routes them to the MariaDB Servers rather than ColumnStore. You can identify which server cluster the query executes on using the version_comment system variable.
trans-unit.target: 上面的MariaDB MaxScale服务器配置将对bank.loan以外的表的查询指定为事务性的，并将其路由到MariaDB服务器而不是ColumnStore。您可以使用 version_comment 系统变量来标识在哪个服务器集群上执行查询。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB MaxScale server configuration above designates queries on the bank.loans table as analytical queries and routes them to the MariaDB ColumnStore User Modules rather than the MariaDB Servers. You can identify which server cluster the query executes on using the version_comment system variable.
trans-unit.target: 上面的MariaDB MaxScale服务器配置将bank.loans表上的查询指定为分析查询，并将其路由到MariaDB ColumnStore用户模块而不是MariaDB服务器。您可以使用 version_comment 系统变量来标识在哪个服务器集群上执行查询。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB Performance Schema is a feature for monitoring the performance of your MariaDB server.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB性能模式是一个监控MariaDB服务器性能的功能。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB Server binaries distributed in this package do not read from .cnf files in /etc/. Instead, put .cnf files in /usr/local/mariadb/etc/.
trans-unit.target: 在这个软件包中发布的MariaDB服务器二进制文件不从/etc/中读取.cnf文件。而是将.cnf文件放在/usr/local/mariadb/etc/中。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB Server performs any select list functions, ORDER BY and LIMIT operations on the result-set.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB服务器执行任何选择列表功能，对结果集进行 ORDER BY 和 LIMIT 操作。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB Server returns the result-set to the client.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB服务器将结果集返回给客户端。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB Server should be backed up using one of the available backup methods described in the server backup and restore overview. Since the column store data is not stored within the MariaDB Server backup should run very quickly. Utilizing either mysqldump or just backing up the directory are straightforward options.
trans-unit.target: 应该使用服务器备份和还原概述中描述的可用备份方法之一来备份MariaDB服务器。由于列存储数据未存储在MariaDB服务器中，因此备份应非常快速地运行。利用mysqldump或仅备份目录是简单的选择。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB Server will be logged here.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB服务器将在这里被记录下来。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB Servers and ColumnStore now contain the same data.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB服务器和ColumnStore现在包含相同的数据。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB XA implementation is based on the X/Open CAE document Distributed Transaction Processing: The XA Specification. This document is published by The Open Group and available at http://www.opengroup.org/public/pubs/catalog/c193.htm.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB XA实现基于X / Open CAE文档“分布式事务处理：XA规范”。本文档由The Open Group发布，可以在http://www.opengroup.org/public/pubs/catalog/c193.htm上找到。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB XA implementation is based on the X/Open CAE document Distributed Transaction Processing: The XA Specification. This document is published by The Open Group and available at http://www.opengroup.org/public/pubs/catalog/c193.htm.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB XA实现基于X / Open CAE文档“分布式事务处理：XA规范”。该文档由The Open Group发布，可以在http://www.opengroup.org/public/pubs/catalog/c193.htm上找到。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB implementation of this plugin is based on the userstatv2 patch from Percona and Ourdelta. The original code comes from Google (Mark Callaghan's team) with additional work from Percona, Ourdelta, and Weldon Whipple. The MariaDB implementation provides the same functionality as the userstatv2 patch but a lot of changes have been made to make it faster and to better fit the MariaDB infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 该插件的MariaDB实现基于Percona和Ourdelta 的userstatv2补丁。原始代码来自Google（Mark Callaghan的团队），另外还有Percona，Ourdelta和Weldon Whipple的工作。MariaDB实现提供与userstatv2修补程序相同的功能，但是进行了许多更改，以使其更快并更好地适合MariaDB基础结构。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB project signs their MariaDB packages for Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora, CentOS, and Red Hat
trans-unit.target: MariaDB项目为Debian、Ubuntu、Fedora、CentOS和Red Hat签署了他们的MariaDB包。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB project signs their MariaDB packages for Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora, CentOS, and Red Hat.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB项目为Debian、Ubuntu、Fedora、CentOS和Red Hat签署了他们的MariaDB包。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB query optimizer decides how best to execute each query based largely on the details of the indexes involved.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB查询优化器主要根据所涉及的索引的细节来决定如何以最佳方式执行每个查询。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB server UDF API: This allows utilization on all storage engines and is the implementation used if applied in the select list.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB服务器的UDF API。这允许在所有的存储引擎上使用,并且是在选择列表中应用时使用的实现。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB server host name.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB服务器的主机名。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB server imposes a number of limitations on user-defined functions for security purposes.
trans-unit.target: 为了安全起见，MariaDB服务器对用户定义的函数施加了许多限制。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB server is running with the %s option so it cannot execute this statement
trans-unit.target: MariaDB服务器是以%s选项运行的,所以它不能执行这条语句。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB server process is running as either a NetworkService Account or a Domain User Account.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB服务器进程正在作为NetworkService帐户或域用户帐户运行。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB server's binary log is a set of files containing "events" which represent modifications to the contents of a MariaDB database. These events are written in a binary (i.e. non-human-readable) format. The mysqlbinlog utility is used to view these events in plain text.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB服务器的二进制日志是一组包含“事件”的文件，这些事件表示对MariaDB数据库内容的修改。这些事件以二进制（即非人类可读）格式编写。该mysqlbinlog可以实用用于查看纯文本这些事件。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB server's binary log is a set of files containing "events" which represent modifications to the contents of a MariaDB database. These events are written in a binary (i.e. non-human-readable) format. The mysqlbinlog utility is used to view these events in plain text.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB服务器的二进制日志是一组包含 "事件 "的文件,它代表了对MariaDB数据库内容的修改。这些事件是以二进制(即非人类可读)的格式写入的。mysqlbinlog工具用来查看这些事件的纯文本。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB user name to use when connecting to the server.
trans-unit.target: 连接到服务器时要使用的MariaDB用户名。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB user name to use when connecting to the server. The default is root.
trans-unit.target: 连接到服务器时使用的MariaDB用户名。默认为root。

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB user needs to be granted the execute privileges for these procedures and the select privileges for the tables in the infinidb_querystats schema. Or, chances are, the following should just work for a super user:
trans-unit.target: 必须为MariaDB用户授予这些过程的执行特权，以及infinidb_querystats模式中表的选择特权。或者，以下情况仅对超级用户有效：

trans-unit.source: The MariaDB username to use when connecting to the server.
trans-unit.target: 连接服务器时要使用的MariaDB用户名。

trans-unit.source: The Mariabackup utility performs physical backups and supports Data-at-Rest...
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup实用程序可执行物理备份,并支持 "静态数据"。

trans-unit.source: The Master User Module will be assigned in the my.cnf file with SERVER-ID of 1. User Module #1 is the default Master at system startup. In the case of a failover where UM1 goes offline and another User Modules takes over as the Master, that User Module will be updated as SERVER-ID of 1. When User Module #1 recovers, it will be assigned a non 1 ID.
trans-unit.target: 主控用户模块将在my.cnf文件中被指定为SERVER-ID为1,用户模块#1是系统启动时的默认主控。如果发生故障切换,UM1脱机,另一个用户模块接替主站,该用户模块将被更新为SERVER-ID为1,当用户模块#1恢复时,它将被分配一个非1的ID。

trans-unit.source: The MaxScale CDC Data Adapter allows to stream change data events(binary log events) from MariaDB Master hosting non-columnstore engines(InnoDB, MyRocks, MyISAM) to MariaDB ColumnStore. In another words replicate data from MariaDB Master to MariaDB ColumnStore. It acts as a CDC Client for MaxScale and uses the events received from MaxScale as input to MariaDB ColumnStore Bulk Data API to push the data to MariaDB ColumnStore.
trans-unit.target: MaxScale CDC数据适配器允许从MariaDB主站托管的非Columnstore引擎(InnoDB,MyRocks,MyISAM)到MariaDB ColumnStore的变化数据事件(二进制日志事件)流。换句话说就是将数据从MariaDB Master复制到MariaDB ColumnStore。它作为MaxScale的CDC客户端,使用从MaxScale接收到的事件作为MariaDB ColumnStore Bulk Data API的输入,将数据推送到MariaDB ColumnStore。

trans-unit.source: The MaxScale CDC Streaming Data Adapter allows you to stream binary log events from MariaDB Servers to MariaDB ColumnStore clusters. In order to use it, install the ColumnStore Bulk Write SDK and the MaxScale CDC Adapter packages on a dedicated host or on any MaxScale server that you want to use for data streaming, (MaxScale-1 in our sample deployment).
trans-unit.target: MaxScale CDC流数据适配器使您可以将二进制日志事件从MariaDB服务器流到MariaDB ColumnStore群集。为了使用它，请将ColumnStore Bulk Write SDK和MaxScale CDC Adapter软件包安装在专用主机或要用于数据流传输的任何MaxScale服务器上（在我们的示例部署中为 MaxScale-1 ）。

trans-unit.source: The MongoDB syntax for Jpath does not allow the CONNECT specific items on arrays. The same effect can still be obtained by a different way. For this, additional options are used when creating MONGO tables.
trans-unit.target: Jpath的MongoDB语法不允许在数组上CONNECT特定项。同样的效果还是可以通过另一种方式获得。为此,在创建MONGO表时,需要使用额外的选项。

trans-unit.source: The Monro
trans-unit.target: 蒙罗人

trans-unit.source: The MyISAM log records all changes to MyISAM tables. It is not enabled by default. To enable it, start the server with the --log-isam option, for example:
trans-unit.target: MyISAM日志记录对MyISAM表的所有更改。默认情况下未启用。要启用它，请使用--log-isam选项启动服务器，例如：

trans-unit.source: The MyISAM storage engine supports three different table storage formats
trans-unit.target: MyISAM存储引擎支持三种不同的表存储格式。

trans-unit.source: The MyISAM storage engine was the default storage engine from MySQL 3.23 until it was replaced by InnoDB in MariaDB and MySQL 5.5. Historically, MyISAM is a replacement for the older ISAM engine, removed in MySQL 4.1.
trans-unit.target: MyISAM存储引擎是MySQL 3.23的默认存储引擎，直到在MariaDB和MySQL 5.5中被InnoDB取代。从历史上看，MyISAM是旧版ISAM引擎的替代品，在MySQL 4.1中已删除。

trans-unit.source: The MyISAM-like DYNAMIC and FIXED format are extremely simple and have very little space overhead, so it's hard to beat them for when it comes to simple scanning of unmodified data. The DYNAMIC format does however get notably worse over time if you update the row a lot in a manner that increases the size of the row.
trans-unit.target: 类似于MyISAM的 DYNAMIC 和 FIXED 格式非常简单，而且空间开销很小，因此在简单扫描未修改的数据时很难击败它们。该 DYNAMIC ，如果你在增加该行的大小的方式更新行了很多格式不但是随着时间的推移显着恶化。

trans-unit.source: The MyRocks storage engine can also be installed via a package manager on Linux. In order to do so, your system needs to be configured to install from one of the MariaDB repositories.
trans-unit.target: MyRocks存储引擎也可以通过Linux上的包管理器进行安装。为了做到这一点,你的系统需要配置为从MariaDB存储库中的一个安装。

trans-unit.source: The MyRocks storage engine is included in binary tarballs on Linux.
trans-unit.target: MyRocks存储引擎包含在Linux上的二进制tarball中。

trans-unit.source: The MyRocks storage engine is included in MSI and ZIP packages on Windows.
trans-unit.target: Windows的MSI和ZIP软件包中包含MyRocks存储引擎。

trans-unit.source: The MyRocks storage engine was first released in MariaDB 10.2.5.
trans-unit.target: MyRocks存储引擎最初在MariaDB 10.2.5中发布。

trans-unit.source: The MyRocks storage engine's shared library is included in MariaDB packages as the ha_rocksdb.so or ha_rocksdb.dll shared library on systems where it can be built. The plugin was first included in MariaDB 10.2.5.
trans-unit.target: MyRocks存储引擎的共享库包含在MariaDB软件包中，作为可在其上构建的系统上的 ha_rocksdb.so 或 ha_rocksdb.dll 共享库。该插件最初包含在MariaDB 10.2.5中。

trans-unit.source: The MySQL version of max_statement_time is defined in millseconds, not seconds
trans-unit.target: max_statement_time 的MySQL版本以毫秒为单位，而不是秒

trans-unit.source: The MySQL/MariaDB connectors retrieve all the rows returned by one query and keep them in a memory cache. This is generally fine in most cases, but not when retrieving a large result set that can make the query fail with a memory exhausted exception.
trans-unit.target: MySQL/MariaDB连接器会检索一次查询返回的所有行,并将它们保存在内存缓存中。这在大多数情况下一般是没有问题的,但在检索一个大的结果集时就不行了,这会使查询失败,出现内存耗尽的异常。

trans-unit.source: The NDB cluster engine does not support changing the binlog format on the fly yet
trans-unit.target: NDB集群引擎还不支持在飞行中改变binlog格式。

trans-unit.source: The NTH_VALUE() function was first introduced with other window functions in MariaDB 10.2.
trans-unit.target: NTH_VALUE（）函数首先与MariaDB 10.2中的其他窗口函数一起引入。

trans-unit.source: The NTILE() function was first introduced with window functions in MariaDB 10.2.0.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.2.0中首先将NTILE（）函数与窗口函数一起引入。

trans-unit.source: The NTile window function allows for breaking up a data set into portions assigned a numeric value to each portion of the range. NTile(4) breaks the data up into quartiles (4 sets). The example query produces a report of all opportunities summarizing the quartile boundaries of amount values.
trans-unit.target: NTile 窗口函数允许将一个数据集分成若干部分,并为每个部分的范围分配一个数值。NTile(4)将数据分成四分位数(4组)。示例查询产生了一份所有机会的报告,总结了金额值的四分位数边界。

trans-unit.source: The OQGRAPH storage engine exists as a separate package in the repositories for MariaDB 10.0.7 and later. On Ubuntu and Debian the package is called mariadb-oqgraph-engine-10.0 or mariadb-plugin-oqgraph. On Red Hat, CentOS, and Fedora the package is called MariaDB-oqgraph-engine. To install the plugin, first install the appropriate package and then install the plugin using the INSTALL SONAME or INSTALL PLUGIN commands.
trans-unit.target: OQGRAPH存储引擎在MariaDB 10.0.7及更高版本的存储库中作为单独的软件包存在。在Ubuntu和Debian上，该软件包称为 mariadb-oqgraph-engine-10.0 或 mariadb-plugin-oqgraph 。在Red Hat，CentOS和Fedora上，该软件包称为 MariaDB-oqgraph-engine 。要安装插件，请先安装适当的软件包，然后使用INSTALL SONAME或INSTALL PLUGIN命令安装插件。

trans-unit.source: The OS and MariaDB have allocated all the 'first' RAM.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统和MariaDB已经分配了所有的 "第一个 "RAM。

trans-unit.source: The OS has some limit on the number of open files it will let a process have. Each table needs 1 to 3 open files. Each PARTITION is effectively a table. Most operations on a partitioned table open _all_ partitions.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统对一个进程的打开文件数量有一定的限制。每个表需要1到3个打开的文件。每个partition实际上就是一个表。对分区表的大多数操作都会打开_所有的分区。

trans-unit.source: The OS is not limited by 4GB, but MariaDB is.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统不受4GB的限制,但MariaDB受限制。

trans-unit.source: The OS needs to allocate something. Ouch -- it is out of room in the one CPU where it is willing to allocate its stuff, so it swaps out some of MariaDB. Bad.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统需要分配一些东西。哎哟--它愿意分配东西的一个CPU里没有空间了,所以它把MariaDB的一些东西换掉了。坏了。

trans-unit.source: The Ocelot GUI (ocelotgui), a database client, allows users to connect to a MySQL or MariaDB DBMS server, enter SQL statements, and receive results. Some of its features are: syntax highlighting, user-settable colors and fonts for each part of the screen, result-set displays with multi-line rows and resizable columns, and a debugger.
trans-unit.target: Ocelot GUI(ocelotgui)是一个数据库客户端,用户可以连接到MySQL或MariaDB DBMS服务器,输入SQL语句,并接收结果。它的一些功能有:语法高亮、用户可设置屏幕各部分的颜色和字体、具有多行和可调整大小的列的结果集显示,以及一个调试器。

trans-unit.source: The Open Query GRAPH computation engine, or OQGRAPH as the engine itself is called, allows you to handle hierarchies (tree structures) and complex graphs (nodes having many connections in several directions).
trans-unit.target: Open Query GRAPH计算引擎,或者说引擎本身被称为OQGRAPH,允许你处理层次结构(树形结构)和复杂的图(在几个方向上有许多连接的节点)。

trans-unit.source: The Performance Module is composed of a number of processes
trans-unit.target: 性能模块由以下几个过程组成

trans-unit.source: The Performance Module or Modules carry out predicate filtering, join processing, initial aggregation of data from local or external storage, then send the data back to the User Module.
trans-unit.target: 性能模块或模块对本地或外部存储的数据进行谓词过滤、加入处理、初步汇总,然后将数据发回用户模块。

trans-unit.source: The Performance Module performs I/O operations in support of read and write processing. It doesn't see the query itself, but only a set of instructions given to it by a User Module.
trans-unit.target: 性能模块执行I / O操作以支持读取和写入处理。它不会看到查询本身，而只会看到用户模块给它的一组指令。

trans-unit.source: The Performance Module processes loads and writes to the underlying persistent storage. It uses two processes to handle this: WriteEngineServer and cpimport.
trans-unit.target: 性能模块处理对底层持久性存储的加载和写入。它使用两个进程来处理这个问题。WriteEngineServer和cpimport。

trans-unit.source: The Performance Module uses a shared nothing data cache. When it first accesses data, it operates on data as instructed by the User Module and caches it in an LRU-based buffer for subsequent access.
trans-unit.target: 性能模块使用无共享数据缓存。首次访问数据时，它会按照用户模块的指示对数据进行操作，并将其缓存在基于LRU的缓冲区中，以供后续访问。

trans-unit.source: The Performance Schema digest is a normalized form of a statement, with the specific data values removed. It allows statistics to be gathered for similar kinds of statements.
trans-unit.target: 性能模式摘要是语句的标准化形式,去掉了具体的数据值。它允许为类似类型的报表收集统计数据。

trans-unit.source: The Performance Schema is a feature for monitoring server performance that was introduced in MariaDB 5.5.
trans-unit.target: 性能模式是MariaDB 5.5中引入的用于监视服务器性能的功能。

trans-unit.source: The Performance Schema was introduced in MariaDB 5.5.
trans-unit.target: 性能模式是在MariaDB 5.5中引入的。

trans-unit.source: The Performance-Module 3 will become the active Parent OAM Module
trans-unit.target: 性能模块3将成为活动的父OAM模块。

trans-unit.source: The Pivot table type of CONNECT makes doing this much simpler.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT的Pivot表类型让做这些事情变得更加简单。

trans-unit.source: The PrimProc process has one job queue for each priority level and thread assigned to each queue. The number of threads assigned to each queue is configurable using the following elements in the configuration file:
trans-unit.target: PrimProc进程为每个优先级有一个作业队列,并为每个队列分配线程。分配给每个队列的线程数可以使用配置文件中的以下元素进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The Primary Process, or PrimProc, handles query execution. The User Modules process queries from the application into instructions that are sent to the Performance Module. PrimProc executes these instructions as block oriented I/O operations to perform predicate filtering, join processing, and the initial aggregation of data, after which PrimProc sends the data back to the User Module.
trans-unit.target: 主流程或PrimProc处理查询执行。该用户模块处理从所述应用程序查询成被发送到性能模块的指令。PrimProc将这些指令作为面向块的I / O操作执行，以执行谓词过滤，联接处理和数据的初始聚集，然后PrimProc将数据发送回用户模块。

trans-unit.target: 进程管理器,或ProcMgr,是负责启动、监控和重启性能模块上所有MariaDB ColumnStore进程的进程。

trans-unit.source: The Query Cache uses blocks of variable length, and over time may become fragmented. A high Qcache_free_blocks relative to Qcache_total_blocks may indicate fragmentation. FLUSH QUERY CACHE will defragment the query cache without dropping any queries :

trans-unit.source: The R Programming language has support for the H2O.ai library (h2o), which enables to create in-memory multi-cluster GPU powered machine learning models.
trans-unit.target: R编程语言支持H2O.ai库（h2o），该库可以创建内存中多集群GPU驱动的机器学习模型。

trans-unit.source: The RANGE partitioning type is used to assign each partition a range of values generated by the partitioning expression. Ranges must be ordered, contiguous and non-overlapping. The minimum value is always included in the first range. The highest value may or may not be included in the last range.
trans-unit.target: RANGE 分区类型用于为每个分区分配由分区表达式生成的值的范围。范围必须是有序的、连续的和不重叠的。最小值总是包含在第一个范围中。最高值可能包含在最后一个范围内,也可能不包含。

trans-unit.source: The RANGE partitioning type is used to assign each partition a range of values.
trans-unit.target: RANGE分区类型用于给每个分区分配一个值的范围。

trans-unit.source: The REDUNDANT row format is the original non-compacted row format.
trans-unit.target: REDUNDANT行格式是原来的非压缩行格式。

trans-unit.source: The RENAME TABLE statement renames one or more ColumnStore tables.
trans-unit.target: RENAME TABLE语句重命名一个或多个ColumnStore表。

trans-unit.source: The RENAME USER statement renames existing MariaDB accounts. To use it, you must have the global CREATE USER privilege or the UPDATE privilege for the mysql database. Each account is named using the same format as for the CREATE USER statement; for example, 'jeffrey'@'localhost'. If you specify only the user name part of the account name, a host name part of '%' is used.
trans-unit.target: RENAME USER语句重命名现有的MariaDB帐户。要使用它，您必须具有 mysql 数据库的全局 CREATE USER 特权或 UPDATE 特权。每个帐户使用与 CREATE USER 语句相同的格式命名。例如 'jeffrey'@'localhost' 。如果仅指定帐户名的用户名部分，则使用主机名部分 '%' 。

trans-unit.source: The RENAME is atomic, so the INSERT process(es) never find that `Staging` is missing.
trans-unit.target: RENAME是原子性的,所以INSERT过程永远不会发现缺少 "Staging"。

trans-unit.source: The REST UI is installed in /usr/share/shard-query/ui by default.

trans-unit.source: The RESTRICT clause limits the table to being dropped in the front end only. This could be useful when the table has been dropped on one user module, and needs to be synced to others.
trans-unit.target: RESTRICT子句限制了表只能在前端被丢弃。当表被丢弃在一个用户模块上,并且需要同步到其他模块上时,这可能是有用的。

trans-unit.source: The ROLLBACK statement undoes transactions that have not been permanently saved to the database with the COMMIT statement.You cannot rollback changes to table properties including ALTER, CREATE, or DROP TABLE statements.
trans-unit.target: ROLLBACK语句可以撤销那些没有通过COMMIT语句永久保存到数据库中的事务,不能回滚对表属性的更改,包括ALTER、CREATE或DROP TABLE语句。

trans-unit.source: The S3 engine uses it's own page cache, modified to be able to handle reading blocks from S3 (of size s3_block_size). Internally the S3 page cache uses pages of aria-block-size for splitting the blocks read from S3.
trans-unit.target: S3引擎使用它自己的页面缓存，已对其进行了修改，以能够处理来自S3的读取块（大小为 s3_block_size ）。在内部，S3页面缓存使用aria-block-size页面来拆分从S3读取的块。

trans-unit.source: The S3 storage engine is based on the Aria code.
trans-unit.target: S3存储引擎是基于Aria代码的。

trans-unit.source: The S3 storage engine supports full MariaDB discovery. This means that if you have the S3 storage engine enabled and properly configured, the table stored in S3 will automatically be discovered when it's accessed with SHOW TABLES, SELECT or any other operation that tries to access it. In the case of SELECT, the .frm file from S3 will be copied to the local storage to speed up future accesses.
trans-unit.target: S3存储引擎支持完整的MariaDB发现。这意味着，如果启用并正确配置了S3存储引擎，则在使用SHOW TABLES，SELECT或任何其他尝试访问它的操作访问存储在S3中的表时，将自动发现该表。在SELECT的情况下，来自S3的.frm文件将被复制到本地存储中，以加快将来的访问速度。

trans-unit.source: The SD and CD variables are the directories of the CONNECT source files and the one containing the libcpprest.so lib. They can be edited to match those on your machine OD is the directory that was made to contain the object files.
trans-unit.target: SD和CD变量是CONNECT源文件和包含libcpprest.so库的目录。可以对它们进行编辑,使其与您机器上的目录相匹配 OD是为包含对象文件而制作的目录。

trans-unit.source: The SELECT statement cannot contain a subquery in the FROM clause.

trans-unit.source: The SELECT statement cannot refer to prepared statement parameters.
trans-unit.target: SELECT语句不能引用准备好的语句参数。

trans-unit.source: The SELECT statement cannot refer to system or user variables.
trans-unit.target: SELECT语句不能引用系统或用户变量。

trans-unit.source: The SELECT statement is used to query the database and display table data. You can add many clauses to filter the data.
trans-unit.target: SELECT语句用于查询数据库并显示表数据。你可以添加许多子句来过滤数据。

trans-unit.source: The SELECT would examine more than MAX_JOIN_SIZE rows; check your WHERE and use SET SQL_BIG_SELECTS=1 or SET MAX_JOIN_SIZE=# if the SELECT is okay
trans-unit.target: SELECT会检查超过MAX_JOIN_SIZE的行;检查你的WHERE,如果SELECT没问题的话,使用SET SQL_BIG_SELECTS=1或SET MAX_JOIN_SIZE=#。

trans-unit.source: The Sphinx storage engine (SphinxSE) is a storage engine that talks to searchd (the Sphinx daemon) to enable text searching. Sphinx and SphinxSE is used as a faster and more customizable alternative to MariaDB's built-in full-text search.
trans-unit.target: Sphinx存储引擎（SphinxSE）是与searchd（Sphinx守护程序）对话以启用文本搜索的存储引擎。Sphinx和SphinxSE被用作MariaDB 内置全文搜索的一种更快，更可定制的替代方法。

trans-unit.source: The Spider storage engine is a storage engine with built-in sharding features. It supports partitioning and xa transactions, and allows tables of different MariaDB instances to be handled as if they were on the same instance. It refers to one possible implementation of ISO/IEC 9075-9:2008 SQL/MED.
trans-unit.target: Spider存储引擎是具有内置分片功能的存储引擎。它支持分区和xa事务，并允许处理不同MariaDB实例的表，就像它们在同一实例上一样。它指的是ISO / IEC 9075-9：2008 SQL / MED的一种可能的实现。

trans-unit.source: The Spider storage engine supports partitioning and xa transactions, and allows tables of different MariaDB instances to be handled as if they were on the same instance.
trans-unit.target: Spider存储引擎支持分区和xa事务，并允许将不同MariaDB实例的表当作在同一实例上一样进行处理。

trans-unit.source: The Spider storage engine supports partitioning and XA transactions, and allows tables of different MariaDB instances to be handled as if they were on the same instance.
trans-unit.target: Spider存储引擎支持分区和XA事务,并允许不同MariaDB实例的表像在同一个实例上一样被处理。

trans-unit.source: The Spider storage engine was first released in MariaDB 10.0.4.
trans-unit.target: Spider存储引擎最初在MariaDB 10.0.4中发布。

trans-unit.target: Spider存储引擎是在MariaDB 10.0.4中引入的

trans-unit.source: The System can go into DBRM Read-Only Mode due to these conditions, a failure while doing a DDL/DML command, network problem between servers where the DBRM could get distributed to the other servers from Performance Module 1, and some failover scenarios. It will be shown by the follow alarm. This alarm along with all critical alarms will be displayed when user logs into the Columnstore Admin Console 'mcsadmin'.
trans-unit.target: 在以下情况下,系统可能会进入 DBRM 只读模式:在执行 DDL/DML 命令时发生故障,服务器之间的网络问题,DBRM 可以从性能模块 1 分发给其他服务器,以及一些故障切换的情况。它将通过下面的报警显示出来。当用户登录到Columnstore管理控制台'mcsadmin'时,这个报警和所有的关键报警都会显示出来。

trans-unit.source: The TINY data type contains integer numeric 1-byte values (the char of the C language) ranging from –128 to 127 for signed type and 0 to 255 for unsigned type. For some table types, TYPE_TINY is used to represent Boolean values (0 is false, anything else is true).
trans-unit.target: TINY数据类型包含整数的1字节数字值（C语言的字符），带符号类型的范围为 –128 至 127 ，带符号类型的范围为 0 至 255 。对于某些表类型，TYPE_TINY用于表示布尔值（0为false，其他为true）。

trans-unit.source: The TLS options are used for providing information about TLS. The options can be set even on slaves that are compiled without TLS support. The TLS options are saved to either the default master.info file or the file that is configured by the master_info_file option, but these TLS options are ignored unless the slave supports TLS.
trans-unit.target: TLS选项用于提供有关TLS的信息。即使在没有TLS支持的情况下编译的从站上，也可以设置这些选项。TLS选项将保存到默认的 master.info 文件或由 master_info_file 选项配置的文件，但是除非从属服务器支持TLS，否则将忽略这些TLS选项。

trans-unit.source: The TLS protocol versions that are supported depend on the underlying TLS library used by the specific MariaDB binary.
trans-unit.target: 支持的TLS协议版本取决于特定的MariaDB二进制所使用的底层TLS库。

trans-unit.source: The User Module / ExeMgr implements any window function calculations, as well as any necessary sorting on the result-set. It then returns the result-set to the server.
trans-unit.target: 用户模块/ExeMgr实现任何窗口函数计算,以及对结果集进行任何必要的排序。然后它将结果集返回给服务器。

trans-unit.source: The User Module contains several processes, including mysqld, ExeMgr, and distribution managers.
trans-unit.target: 用户模块包含几个进程，包括 mysqld ，ExeMgr和分发管理器。

trans-unit.source: The User Module converts the MariaDB execution plan and optimizes the given objects into a ColumnStore execution plan. It then determines the steps needed to run the query and the order in which they need to be run.
trans-unit.target: 用户模块将MariaDB执行计划转换,并将给定对象优化为ColumnStore执行计划。然后,它确定运行查询所需的步骤以及它们需要运行的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The User Module manages and controls the operation of end user queries. It maintains the state of each query, issues requests to one or more Performance Modules to process the query, and resolves the query by aggregating the various result-sets from all participating Performance Modules into the one returned to the end user.
trans-unit.target: 用户模块管理和控制终端用户查询的操作。它维护每个查询的状态,向一个或多个性能模块发出处理查询的请求,并通过将所有参与的性能模块的各种结果集汇总成返回给最终用户的结果来解决查询。

trans-unit.source: The User Module manages and controls the operation of end-user queries
trans-unit.target: 用户模块管理和控制终端用户查询的操作。

trans-unit.source: The User Module performs the final result-set aggregation and composes the result-set for the query.
trans-unit.target: 用户模块执行最后的结果集聚合,并为查询组成结果集。

trans-unit.source: The User Module runs mysqld. This is the MariaDB Server running with ColumnStore. It performs the same tasks as a normal MariaDB Server deployment: validating connections, parsing SQL statements, SQL plan generation, and final result-set distribution.
trans-unit.target: 用户模块运行 mysqld 。这是与ColumnStore一起运行的MariaDB服务器。它执行与普通MariaDB Server部署相同的任务：验证连接，解析SQL语句，SQL计划生成和最终结果集分发。

trans-unit.source: The User Module then consults the Extent Map to determine which Performance Modules to consult for the data it needs, it then performs Extent Elimination, eliminating any Performance Modules from the list that only contain data outside the range of what the query requires.
trans-unit.target: 然后,用户模块会查询 "范围图",以确定它所需要的数据要查询哪些性能模块,然后它执行 "范围消除",从列表中消除任何只包含查询所需范围外的数据的性能模块。

trans-unit.source: The User Module then sends commands to one or more Performance Modules to perform block I/O operations.
trans-unit.target: 然后,用户模块向一个或多个性能模块发送命令,执行块I/O操作。

trans-unit.source: The User Statistics feature was first released in MariaDB 5.2.0. The feature was moved to the userstat plugin in MariaDB 10.1.1.
trans-unit.target: 用户统计信息功能首先在MariaDB 5.2.0中发布。该功能已移至MariaDB 10.1.1中的 userstat 插件。

trans-unit.source: The VARBINARY type is similar to the VARCHAR type, but stores binary byte strings rather than non-binary character strings. M represents the maximum column length in bytes.
trans-unit.target: VARBINARY类型类似于VARCHAR类型，但是存储二进制字节字符串而不是非二进制字符串。 M 表示最大列长度（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The VIR virtual type for the CONNECT handler was introduced in MariaDB 10.0.15.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.0.15中引入了CONNECT处理程序的VIR虚拟类型。

trans-unit.source: The Version Buffer uses in-memory hash tables to supply memory access to in-flight transaction information. It starts at 4MB with the memory region growing from that amount to handle blocks that are being modified by a transaction. Each entry in the hash table is a 40-byte reference to the 8KB block being modified.
trans-unit.target: 版本缓冲区使用内存中的哈希表来提供飞行中事务信息的内存访问。它从4MB开始,内存区域从这个数量开始增长,以处理被事务修改的块。哈希表中的每个条目都是对被修改的8KB块的40字节引用。

trans-unit.source: The VersionBufferFileSize setting is updated in the ColumnStore.xml typically located under /usr/local/mariadb/columnstore/etc. This dictates the size of the version buffer file on disk which provides DML transactional consistency. The default value is '1GB' which reserves up to a 1 Gigabyte file size. Modify this on the PM1 node and restart the system if you require a larger value.
trans-unit.target: VersionBufferFileSize设置在ColumnStore.xml中更新,通常位于/usr/local/mariadb/columnstore/etc下。这决定了磁盘上版本缓冲文件的大小,它提供了DML事务的一致性。默认值是 "1GB",它最多保留1GB的文件大小。在PM1节点上修改这个值,如果你需要更大的值,可以重新启动系统。

trans-unit.source: The WEIGHT_STRING function was introduced in MariaDB 10.0.5.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.0.5中引入了WEIGHT_STRING函数。

trans-unit.source: The Windows implementation is completely different – MariaDB's uses native Windows threadpooling, while Oracle's implementation includes a convenience function WSAPoll() (provided for convenience to port Unix applications). As a consequence of relying on WSAPoll(), Oracle's implementation will not work with named pipes and shared memory connections.
trans-unit.target: Windows实现是完全不同的– MariaDB使用本地Windows 线程池，而Oracle的实现包括便利函数WSAPoll（）（为移植Unix应用程序提供便利）。依靠WSAPoll（）的结果是，Oracle的实现不适用于命名管道和共享内存连接。

trans-unit.source: The Windows implementation of the thread pool uses a native thread pool created with the CreateThreadpool API.
trans-unit.target: Windows线程池的实现使用通过 CreateThreadpool API 创建的本机线程池。

trans-unit.source: The XtraDB/InnoDB recovery mode is a mode used for recovering from emergency situations. The innodb_force_recovery server system variable sets the recovery mode. A mode of 0 is normal use, while the higher the mode, the more stringent the restrictions. Higher modes incorporate all limitations of the lower modes.
trans-unit.target: XtraDB / InnoDB恢复模式是用于从紧急情况中恢复的模式。该innodb_force_recovery服务器系统变量设置恢复模式。正常使用模式0，而模式越高，限制越严格。较高模式合并了较低模式的所有限制。

If the table is not created on ColumnStore, the adapter will print instructions on how to define it in the correct way.

trans-unit.source: The above example illustrates that when the added columns are declared NOT NULL, a DEFAULT value must be available, either implied by the data type or set explicitly by the user. The expression need not be constant, but it must not refer to the columns of the table, such as DEFAULT u+1 (a MariaDB extension). The DEFAULT current_timestamp() would be evaluated at the time of the ALTER TABLE and apply to each row, like it does for non-instant ALTER TABLE. If a subsequent ALTER TABLE changes the DEFAULT value for subsequent INSERT, the values of the columns in existing records will naturally be unaffected.
trans-unit.target: 上面的例子说明,当添加的列被声明为NOT NULL时,必须有一个DEFAULT值,可以是数据类型隐含的,也可以是用户明确设置的。该表达式不需要是常数,但它必须不引用表的列,如DEFAULT u+1(MariaDB扩展)。DEFAULT current_timestamp()将在ALTER TABLE的时候被评估,并应用于每一条记录,就像对非即时ALTER TABLE一样。如果后续的ALTER TABLE改变了后续INSERT的DEFAULT值,那么现有记录中列的值自然不会受到影响。

trans-unit.source: The above logic for a single table join extrapolates out to multi table joins where the small table values are precalculated and performed as one single scan against the large table. This works well for the typical star schema case joining multiple dimension tables with a large fact table. For some join scenarios it may be necessary to sequence joins to create the intermediate datasets for joining, this would happen for instance with a snowflake schema structure. In some extreme cases it may be hard for the optimizer to be able to determine the most optimal join path. In this case a hint is available to force a join ordering. The INFINIDB_ORDERED hint will force the first table in the from clause to be considered the largest table and override any statistics based decision, for example:
trans-unit.target: 上述单表连接的逻辑可以推断出多表连接,在多表连接中,小表的值会被预先计算,并作为对大表的一次扫描来执行。这对于典型的星型模式连接多维表和大事实表的情况来说,效果很好。对于某些联接方案,可能需要对联接进行排序,以创建用于联接的中间数据集,例如雪花模式结构就会出现这种情况。在一些极端的情况下,优化器可能很难确定最优化的连接路径。在这种情况下,我们可以使用一个提示来强制进行连接排序。INFINIDB_ORDERED提示将强制from子句中的第一个表被认为是最大的表,并覆盖任何基于统计的决定,例如。

trans-unit.source: The access mode specifies whether the transaction is allowed to write data or not. By default, transactions are in READ WRITE mode (see the tx_read_only system variable). READ ONLY mode allows the storage engine to apply optimizations that cannot be used for transactions which write data. The only exception to this rule is that read only transactions can perform DDL statements on temporary tables.
trans-unit.target: 访问模式指定是否允许事务写入数据。缺省情况下，事务处于 READ WRITE 模式下（请参见tx_read_only系统变量）。 READ ONLY 模式允许存储引擎应用无法用于写入数据的事务的优化。该规则的唯一例外是只读事务可以在临时表上执行DDL语句。

trans-unit.source: The answer is: SQL is a statically-typed language. The SQL interpreter needs to know the datatypes of all expressions before the query is run (for example, when one is using prepared statements and runs "select COLUMN_GET(...)", the prepared statement API requires the server to inform the client about the datatype of the column being read before the query is executed and the server can see what datatype the column actually has).
trans-unit.target: 答案是：SQL是一种静态类型的语言。在运行查询之前，SQL解释器需要知道所有表达式的数据类型（例如，当一个人使用准备好的语句并运行 "select COLUMN_GET(...)" ，准备好的语句API要求服务器通知客户端有关执行查询之前读取的列的数据类型，服务器可以看到该列实际具有的数据类型）。

trans-unit.source: The atomic group (?>bc|b) in the above example can be "translated" as "if there is bc, then don't try to match as b". So b can match only if bc is not found.
trans-unit.target: 上例中的原子团 (?>bc|b) 可以“翻译”为“如果存在 bc ，则不要尝试将其匹配为 b ”。因此，只有在找不到 bc 时 b 才能匹配。

trans-unit.source: The audit plugin logs user access to MariaDB and its objects. The audit trail (i.e., audit log) is a set of records, written as a list of fields to a file in a plain‐text format. The fields in the log are separated by commas. The format used for the plugin's own log file is slightly different from the format used if it logs to the system log because it has its own standard format. The general format for the logging to the plugin's own file is defined like the following:

trans-unit.source: The backup for each table consists of its .frm format file and .MYD data file. The restore operation restores those files, and then uses them to rebuild the .MYI index file. Restoring takes longer than backing up due to the need to rebuild the indexes. The more indexes the table has, the longer it takes.
trans-unit.target: 每个表的备份包括其.frm格式文件和.MYD数据文件。还原操作会恢复这些文件,然后用它们重建.MYI索引文件。由于需要重建索引,恢复的时间比备份的时间长。表的索引越多,需要的时间就越长。

trans-unit.source: The backup utility mysqldump produces backup files containing the SQL statements needed to recreate the database. As a result, it restores a database with the bare minimum data rather than any additional information that might have built up in the tablespace file.
trans-unit.target: 备份工具mysqldump产生的备份文件包含重新创建数据库所需的SQL语句。因此,它在恢复数据库时,使用的是最低限度的数据,而不是表空间文件中可能积累的任何附加信息。

trans-unit.source: The basic difference between synchronous and asynchronous replication is that "synchronous" replication guarantees that if a change happened on one node in the cluster, then the change will happen on other nodes in the cluster "synchronously", or at the same time. "Asynchronous" replication gives no guarantees about the delay between applying changes on "master" node and the propagation of changes to "slave" nodes. The delay with "asynchronous" replication can be short or long. This also implies that if master node crashes in an "asynchronous" replication topology, then some of the latest changes may be lost.
trans-unit.target: 同步复制和异步复制之间的基本区别在于,"同步 "复制保证,如果集群中的一个节点上发生了变化,那么该变化将 "同步 "或同时发生在集群中的其他节点上。而 "异步 "复制并不能保证在 "主 "节点上应用变更和将变更传播到 "从 "节点之间的延迟。"异步 "复制的延迟可以很短,也可以很长。这也意味着,如果主节点在 "异步 "复制拓扑中崩溃,那么一些最新的更改可能会丢失。

trans-unit.source: The basic idea behind table elimination is that sometimes it is possible to resolve a query without even accessing some of the tables that the query refers to. One can invent many kinds of such cases, but in Table Elimination we targeted only a certain class of SQL constructs that one ends up writing when they are querying highly-normalized data.
trans-unit.target: 消除表的基本思想是，有时甚至不访问查询所引用的某些表就可以解决查询。一个人可以发明出许多种这样的情况，但是在表消除中，我们只针对一类特定的SQL构造，当它们查询高度规范化的数据时，它们最终会编写出来。

trans-unit.source: The basic idea behind table elimination is that sometimes it is possible to...
trans-unit.target: 餐桌消除的基本思路是,有时可以......

trans-unit.source: The basic idea of subquery materialization is to execute the subquery and store its result in an internal temporary table indexed on all its columns. Naturally, this is possible only when the subquery is non-correlated. The IN predicate tests whether its left operand is present in the subquery result. Therefore it is not necessary to store duplicate subquery result rows in the temporary table. Storing only unique subquery rows provides two benefits - the size of the temporary table is smaller, and the index on all its columns can be unique.
trans-unit.target: 子查询物质化的基本思想是执行子查询,并将其结果存储在一个内部临时表中,该表的所有列都有索引。当然,只有当子查询是非相关的时候,这才有可能。IN谓词测试其左操作数是否存在于子查询结果中。因此,没有必要在临时表中存储重复的子查询结果行。只存储唯一的子查询行有两个好处--临时表的大小较小,其所有列上的索引可以是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: The basic principle of the new files used by multi source replication is that they have the same name as the original relay log files suffixed with connection_name before the extension. The main exception is the file that holds all connection is named as the normal master-info-file with a multi- prefix.
trans-unit.target: 多源复制使用的新文件的基本原理是，它们与扩展名后带有 connection_name 后缀的原始中继日志文件具有相同的名称。主要的例外是保存所有连接的文件被命名为带有 multi- 前缀的普通 master-info-file 。

For example, the Index Read Ratio is an important value but it's not present in SHOW STATUS; it's an inferred value (the ratio of Key_reads to Key_read_requests).

trans-unit.source: The big goal is to minimize the disk hits. Let's itemize how few disk hits are needed. When finding the latest articles with 'normal' code, you will probably find that it is doing significant scans of the Articles table, failing to quickly home in on the 10 rows you want. With this design, there is only one extra disk hit:
trans-unit.target: 大的目标是尽量减少磁盘点击率。让我们来逐项说明一下需要的磁盘点击量有多少。当用 "正常 "代码查找最新的文章时,你可能会发现它对文章表进行了大量的扫描,无法快速地找到你想要的10行。采用这种设计,只需要多打一次磁盘。

trans-unit.source: The big win for Case #1: DROP PARTITION is a lot faster than DELETEing a lot of rows.
trans-unit.target: Case#1的大赢家:DROP PARTITION比DELETEING很多行快很多。

trans-unit.source: The big win for Case #2: Scanning fewer rows.
trans-unit.target: 案例二的大赢家:扫描行数少。

trans-unit.source: The big win for Case #3: Improving caching to decrease I/O to speed up operations.
trans-unit.target: 案例3的大赢家:改进缓存,减少I/O,加快操作速度。

trans-unit.source: The big win for Case #4: Quickly moving a partition in between tables (or servers).

You can enable this with --binlog-annotate-row-events.

trans-unit.source: The buffer pool attempts to keep frequently-used blocks in the buffer, and so essentially works as two sublists, a new sublist of recently-used information, and an old sublist of older information. By default, 37% of the list is reserved for the old list.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲池试图将经常使用的块保留在缓冲区中，因此实际上起着两个子列表的作用：一个是最近使用的信息的新子列表，另一个是旧信息的旧子列表。默认情况下，列表的37％保留用于旧列表。

trans-unit.source: The buffer pool can be dumped and restored since MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 自MariaDB 10.0起，可以转储并还原缓冲池。

trans-unit.source: The bulk loads are an append operation to a table so they allow existing data to be read and remain unaffected during the process.
trans-unit.target: 批量加载是对表的追加操作,所以它们允许读取现有数据,并在过程中保持不受影响。

trans-unit.source: The bulk loads do not write their data operations to the transaction log; they are not transactional in nature but are considered an atomic operation at this time. Information markers, however, are placed in the transaction log so the DBA is aware that a bulk operation did occur.
trans-unit.target: 批量加载不会将其数据操作写入事务日志,它们并不是事务性的,而是此时被认为是原子操作。但是,信息标记会被放在事务日志中,这样DBA就知道确实发生了批量操作。

trans-unit.source: The cache implementation itself is simple and straightforward, a hashtable wrapped in a class and a C API (see APIs below).
trans-unit.target: 缓存的实现本身很简单,也很直接,是用一个类和一个C API包装的哈希特表(见下面的API)。

trans-unit.source: The cache is completely transparent for a user; MariaDB makes sure that it always stores the actual table definition and invalidates the .frm file automatically when it becomes out of date. This can happen, for example, if a user copies a new Archive table into the datadir and forgets to delete the .frm file of the old table with the same name.
trans-unit.target: 缓存对用户完全透明；MariaDB确保始终存储实际的表定义，并在 .frm 文件过期时自动使它失效。例如，如果用户将新的存档表复制到datadir中，而忘记删除具有相同名称的旧表的 .frm 文件，则会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The choice between these algorithms depends on the session variable connect_use_tempfile.
trans-unit.target: 这些算法之间的选择取决于会话变量connect_use_tempfile。

trans-unit.source: The choice depends on which is faster (insertion or processing). There are tradeoffs; a single processing thread avoids some locks, but lacks some parallelism.
trans-unit.target: 选择取决于哪个更快(插入或处理)。有权衡,单处理线程可以避免一些锁,但缺乏一些并行性。

trans-unit.source: The choice of which of several non-unique indexes to use is based on the cardinality of indexes; the one that is most selective (has the smallest average number of rows per distinct tuple of column values) is preferred. Note that for this choice to be effective, for most storage engines (like MyISAM, InnoDB) it is necessary to make sure ANALYZE TABLE has been run on the slave, otherwise statistics about index cardinality will not be available. In the absence of index cardinality, the first unique index will be chosen, if any, else the first non-unique index.
trans-unit.target: 根据索引的基数选择使用几个非唯一索引中的哪一个；最好是最有选择性的（每列值的不同元组的平均行数最少）。请注意，对于大多数存储引擎（如MyISAM，InnoDB）而言，要使此选择生效，必须确保ANALYZE TABLE已在从属服务器上运行，否则将不提供有关索引基数的统计信息。在没有索引基数的情况下，将选择第一个唯一索引（如果有），否则将选择第一个非唯一索引。

trans-unit.source: The cluster address can also contain a comma-separated list of multiple members of the cluster. It is good practice to list all possible members of the cluster, for example gcomm:<node1 name or ip>,<node2 name or ip2>,<node3 name or ip>. Alternately if multicast is use put the multicast address instead of the list of nodes. Each member address or multicast address can specify <node name or ip>:<port> if a non-default port is used.
trans-unit.target: 群集地址还可以包含以逗号分隔的多个成员列表。优良作法是列出集群的所有可能成员，例如 gcomm:<node1 name or ip>,<node2 name or ip2>,<node3 name or ip> 。或者，如果使用多播，则将多播地址而不是节点列表放进去。如果使用非默认端口，则每个成员地址或多播地址都可以指定 <node name or ip>:<port> 。

trans-unit.source: The cluster address shouldn't be empty like gcomm://. This should never be hardcoded into any configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 群集地址不应像 gcomm:// 一样为空。绝对不要将其硬编码到任何配置文件中。

trans-unit.source: The cluster nodes can be configured to invoke a command when cluster membership or node status changes. This mechanism can also be used to communicate the event to some external monitoring agent. This is configured by setting wsrep_notify_cmd. See Galera Cluster documentation: Notification Command for more information.
trans-unit.target: 可以将群集节点配置为在群集成员身份或节点状态更改时调用命令。此机制还可以用于将事件传达给某些外部监视代理。通过设置 wsrep_notify_cmd 进行配置。有关更多信息，请参见Galera Cluster文档：Notification Command。

trans-unit.source: The code has been benchmarked at about 20 microseconds per call on a 2011-vintage PC. If you had to check a million points, that would take 20 seconds -- far too much for a web application. So, one goal of the Procedure that uses it will be to minimize the usage of this function. With the code presented here, the function need be called only a few dozen or few hundred times, except in pathological cases.
trans-unit.target: 该代码在2011年的老式PC上进行了每次调用约20微秒的基准测试。如果你要检查一百万个点,那就需要20秒--对于一个网络应用来说,太长了。所以,使用它的Procedure的一个目标将是尽量减少这个函数的使用。通过这里介绍的代码,该函数只需要调用几十次或几百次,除非在病理情况下。

trans-unit.source: The columnar disk storage format is unchanged between InfiniDB 4.X and MariaDB ColumnStore allowing for a software upgrade on the same system. This document outlines an approach to perform the upgrade.
trans-unit.target: InfiniDB 4.X和MariaDB ColumnStore之间的列式磁盘存储格式没有变化,允许在同一系统上进行软件升级。本文档概述了一种执行升级的方法。

trans-unit.source: The columnar disk storage format is unchanged between InfiniDB 4.X and MariaDB ColumnStore allowing for relatively straightforward data migration utilizing backup and restore logic. This document outlines an approach to perform the migration that can be adapted to your particular needs.
trans-unit.target: InfiniDB 4.X和MariaDB ColumnStore之间的列式磁盘存储格式没有变化,允许利用备份和还原逻辑进行相对直接的数据迁移。本文档概述了一种执行迁移的方法,可以根据您的特定需求进行调整。

If MariaDB automatically creates an index for the foreign key (because it does not exist and is not explicitly created), its name will be index_name.

trans-unit.source: The columnstoreBackup option -n [value] limits the number parallel rsync commands executed at a given time. The default 5 means up to 5 DBRoots will kick off rysnc commands to various PMs and the backup system will wait until all are complete and verified successful. At this time it will kick off another 5 DBRoots. The progress indicator should reflect the percentage of total completion and not individual rysnc commands. This value can be set higher via the -n command but if the number of DBRoots present in the system is large enough there may be a performance hit on system processing or network bandwidth limitations.
trans-unit.target: columnstoreBackup选项-n[值]限制了在给定时间内执行的并行rsync命令的数量。默认的5意味着最多5个DBRoots将启动对不同PM的rsync命令,备份系统将等待所有命令完成并验证成功。此时,它将启动另外5个DBRoots。进度指标应该反映的是总完成的百分比,而不是单个rysnc命令。这个值可以通过-n命令设置得更高,但如果系统中存在的DBRoots数量足够多,可能会对系统处理或网络带宽限制产生性能冲击。

trans-unit.source: The columnstoreRestore option -n [value] limits the number parallel rsync commands executed at a given time. The default 5 means up to 5 DBRoots will kick off rysnc commands to various PMs and the backup system will wait until all are complete and verified successful. At this time it will kick off another 5 DBRoots. The progress indicator should reflect the percentage of total completion and not individual rysnc commands. This value can be set higher via the -n command but if the number of DBRoots present in the system is large enough there may be a performance hit on system processing or network bandwidth limitations.
trans-unit.target: columnstoreRestore选项-n[值]限制了在给定时间内执行的并行rsync命令的数量。默认的5意味着最多5个DBRoots将启动对不同PM的rsync命令,备份系统将等待所有命令完成并验证成功。此时,它将启动另外5个DBRoots。进度指标应该反映的是总完成的百分比,而不是单个rysnc命令。这个值可以通过-n命令设置得更高,但如果系统中存在的DBRoots数量足够多,可能会对系统处理或网络带宽限制产生性能冲击。

trans-unit.source: The columnstore_files table provides information about each file associated with extensions. Each extension can reuse a file at different block offsets so this is not a 1:1 relationship to the columnstore_extents table.

trans-unit.source: The complete process of testing is governed and monitored by the mysql-test-run.pl driver script, or mtr for short (for convenience, mtr is created as a symbolic link to mysql-test-run.pl). The mtr script is responsible for preparing the test environment, creating a list of all tests to run, running them, and producing the report at the end. It can run many tests in parallel, execute tests in an order which minimizes server restarts (as they are slow), run tests in a debugger or under valgrind or strace, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 测试的完整过程由mysql-test-run.pl驱动程序脚本（或简称mtr）控制和监视（为方便起见，将 mtr 创建为指向 mysql-test-run.pl 的符号链接）。 mtr脚本负责准备测试环境，创建要运行的所有测试的列表，运行它们并最终生成报告。它可以并行运行许多测试，以最小化服务器重新启动的顺序执行测试（因为它们很慢），可以在调试器中或在valgrind或strace下运行测试，等等。

trans-unit.source: The current MariaDB thread pool was implemented in MariaDB 5.5. It replaced the legacy thread pool that was introduced in MariaDB 5.1. The main drawback of the previous solution was that this pool was static–it had a fixed number of threads. Static thread pools can have their merits, for some limited use cases, such as cases where callbacks executed by the threads never block and do not depend on each other. For example, iimagine something like an echo server.
trans-unit.target: 当前的MariaDB线程池是在MariaDB 5.5中实现的。它替换了MariaDB 5.1中引入的旧线程池。先前解决方案的主要缺点是该池是静态的-它具有固定数量的线程。在某些有限的用例中，例如线程执行的回调从不阻塞并且彼此不依赖的情况，静态线程池可以具有其优点。例如，我想像回声服务器之类的东西。

trans-unit.source: The currently executing statement does not affect the value of LAST_INSERT_ID(). Suppose that you generate an AUTO_INCREMENT value with one statement, and then refer to LAST_INSERT_ID() in a multiple-row INSERT statement that inserts rows into a table with its own AUTO_INCREMENT column. The value of LAST_INSERT_ID() will remain stable in the second statement; its value for the second and later rows is not affected by the earlier row insertions. (However, if you mix references to LAST_INSERT_ID() and LAST_INSERT_ID(expr), the effect is undefined.)
trans-unit.target: 当前执行的语句不会影响LAST_INSERT_ID()的值。假设你用一条语句生成了一个AUTO_INCREMENT值,然后在多行INSERT语句中引用LAST_INSERT_ID(),在一个有自己AUTO_INCREMENT列的表中插入行。在第二条语句中,LAST_INSERT_ID()的值将保持稳定;它在第二条和后面的行中的值不会受到前面行插入的影响。(但是,如果混合引用LAST_INSERT_ID()和LAST_INSERT_ID(expr),效果是未定义的。)

trans-unit.source: The default MariaDB ColumnStore installation process supports a Distributed installation functionality for Multi-Node installs. trans-unit.source: The default behavior, which occurs if ALGORITHM=DEFAULT is specified, or if ALGORITHM is not specified at all, usually only makes a copy if the operation doesn't support being done in-place at all. In this case, the most efficient available algorithm will usually be used.

trans-unit.source: The default operation is update (-u). If a recovery is done (-r), all writes and possibly updates and deletes are done and errors are only counted. trans-unit.source: The default setting encourages the server to use swap. Since there probably won't be much else on the database server besides MariaDB processes to put into swap, you'll probably want to reduce this to zero to avoid swapping as much as possible. You can change the default by adding a line to the sysctl.conf file (usually found in /etc/sysctl.conf).
trans-unit.target: 默认设置鼓励服务器使用交换。由于除了MariaDB进程之外，数据库服务器上可能没有其他要交换的内容，因此您可能希望将其减少为零以避免尽可能多的交换。您可以通过在 sysctl.conf 文件中添加一行（通常在 /etc/sysctl.conf 中）来更改默认值。

trans-unit.source: The default setting for vm.swappiness is set to 30. This setting can be overridden by user on each instance.
trans-unit.target: vm.swappiness的默认设置为30。这个设置可以由用户在每个实例上覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The default setting of 022 in /etc/profile is what is recommended. It it required that it the setting doesn't end with a 7, like 077. Example, on a root install, mysqld that runs as 'mysql' user needs to be able to read the MariaDB ColumnStore configuration file, Columnstore.xml. So a last digit of 7 would prevent this and cause the install to fail.
trans-unit.target: 推荐使用/etc/profile中的默认设置022。它要求它的设置不能以7结尾,比如077。例如,在root安装中,以'mysql'用户身份运行的mysqld需要能够读取MariaDB ColumnStore配置文件Columnstore.xml。所以最后一位数字为7就会阻止这一点,导致安装失败。

trans-unit.source: The default setting of 022 is what is recommended. ColumnStore requires that it not end with a 7, like 077. For example, on a root installation, mysqld runs as the mysql user, and needs to be able to read the ColumnStore configuration file, which likely is not owned by mysql. If it were, then the other ColumnStore processes could not read it.
trans-unit.target: 推荐的是默认设置为022。ColumnStore要求不要像077那样以7结尾。例如,在root安装中,mysqld作为mysql用户运行,需要能够读取ColumnStore配置文件,而这个文件很可能不是mysql拥有的。如果是,那么其他ColumnStore进程就无法读取它。

trans-unit.source: The default size is 100 rows, which can be changed by modifying the performance_schema_setup_actors_size system variable at server startup.
trans-unit.target: 默认大小为100行，可以在服务器启动时通过修改 performance_schema_setup_actors_size 系统变量来更改。

trans-unit.source: The default systemd unit file also sets ProtectSystem=full, which places restrictions on writing to a few other directories. Overwriting this with ProtectSystem=off in the same way as above will restore access to these directories.
trans-unit.target: 默认的systemd单位文件还设置了ProtectSystem = full，这对写入其他几个目录有限制。以与上述相同的方式用 ProtectSystem=off 覆盖此设置，将恢复对这些目录的访问。

trans-unit.source: The default username is: user and the password is mpp.
trans-unit.target: 默认的用户名是:user,密码是mpp。

trans-unit.source: The default value 8192, should be ok for most cases. The only problem with a higher value is that it takes longer to find a packed key in the block as one has to search roughly 8192/2 to find each key. We plan to fix this by adding a dictionary at the end of the page to be able to do a binary search within the block before starting a scan. Until this is done and key lookups takes too long time even if you are not hitting disk, then you should consider making this smaller.
trans-unit.target: 默认值8192,对于大多数情况应该是可以的。较高值的唯一问题是,在区块中找到一个打包的键需要花费较长的时间,因为必须搜索大约8192/2才能找到每个键。我们计划通过在页面末尾添加一个字典来解决这个问题,以便在开始扫描之前能够在块中进行二进制搜索。在这一点完成之前,即使你不打磁盘,键查找也需要太长的时间,那么你应该考虑把这个变小。

trans-unit.source: The default value will be used if you INSERT a row without specifying a value for that column, or if you specify DEFAULT for that column. Before MariaDB 10.2.1 you couldn't usually provide an expression or function to evaluate at insertion time. You had to provide a constant default value instead. The one exception is that you may use CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as the default value for a TIMESTAMP column to use the current timestamp at insertion time.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在不为该列指定值的情况下 INSERT 行，或者为该列指定了 DEFAULT ，则将使用默认值。在MariaDB 10.2.1之前，您通常无法在插入时提供表达式或函数来求值。您必须提供一个恒定的默认值。一个例外是您可以将 CURRENT_TIMESTAMP 用作 TIMESTAMP 列的默认值，以在插入时使用当前时间戳。

trans-unit.source: The default wrapper, JdbcInterface, is the only one distributed with binary distribution. It uses the standard way to get a connection to the drivers via the DriverManager.getConnection method. Other wrappers, only available with source distribution, enable connection to a Data Source, eventually implementing pooling. However, they must be compiled and installed manually.
trans-unit.target: 默认的封装器JdbcInterface是唯一一个以二进制方式发布的封装器,它使用标准的方式通过DriverManager.getConnection方法获得与驱动程序的连接。它使用标准的方式,通过DriverManager.getConnection方法获得与驱动程序的连接。其他的包装器,只有在源码分发时才有,它可以实现与数据源的连接,最终实现池化。然而,它们必须手动编译和安装。

trans-unit.source: The defaults are 60, 30, and 10 respectively. Each queue is given at least 1 thread so there is neither 'idle' priority configuration possible nor starvation. The number of threads started is normalized such that 100% = 2 * (the number of cores on the machine). The user can overbook or underbook their CPUs however they want. This is an example of how threads are assigned on an 8-core system using the defaults.
trans-unit.target: 默认值分别是60、30和10。每个队列至少有1个线程,所以既不可能有 "空闲 "的优先级配置,也不可能有饥饿感。启动的线程数是标准化的,即100%=2*(机器上的核心数)。用户可以按照自己的意愿超额或低额配置CPU。这是一个在8核系统上使用默认值分配线程的例子。

trans-unit.source: The easiest approach is to run MariaDB Server in an EC2 instance that has an IAM Role with User access to the CMK you wish to use. You can give key access privileges to a Role already attached to your EC2 instance, or you can create a new IAM Role and attach it to an already-running EC2 instance. If you've done that, no further credentials management is required and you do not need to create a credentials file.
trans-unit.target: 最简单的方法是在具有IAM角色且对用户要使用的CMK具有用户访问权限的EC2实例中运行MariaDB Server。您可以为已经附加到您的EC2实例的角色赋予关键访问权限，或者可以创建新的IAM角色并将其附加到已经在运行的EC2实例。如果这样做，则不需要进一步的凭据管理，也不需要创建 credentials 文件。

trans-unit.source: The encryption key to use is chosen based on the second argument to DES_ENCRYPT(), if one was given. With no argument, the first key from the DES key file is used. With a key_num argument, the given key number (0-9) from the DES key file is used. With a key_str argument, the given key string is used to encrypt str.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定了 DES_ENCRYPT() 的第二个参数，则选择要使用的加密密钥。不带参数的情况下，将使用DES密钥文件中的第一个密钥。通过 key_num 参数，使用DES密钥文件中给定的密钥号（0-9）。通过 key_str 参数，给定的密钥字符串用于加密 str 。

trans-unit.source: The encryption password has a max length of 256 characters.
trans-unit.target: 加密密码的最大长度为256个字符。

trans-unit.source: The escape sequence \K causes any previously matched characters to be excluded from the final matched sequence. For example, the pattern: (foo)\Kbar matches foobar, but reports that it has matched bar. This feature is similar to a look-behind assertion. However, in this case, the part of the subject before the real match does not have to be of fixed length:
trans-unit.target: 转义序列 \K 导致所有先前匹配的字符都从最终匹配序列中排除。例如，模式： (foo)\Kbar 与 foobar 匹配，但是报告它与 bar 匹配。此功能类似于后向声明。但是，在这种情况下，真实匹配之前的主题部分不必具有固定的长度：

trans-unit.source: The event can be an INSERT, and UPDATE or a DELETE. The trigger can be executed BEFORE or AFTER the event. Until MariaDB 10.2.3, a table could have only one trigger defined for each event/timing combination: for example, a table could only have one BEFORE INSERT trigger.
trans-unit.target: 该事件可以是INSERT，UPDATE或DELETE。可以在事件之前或之后执行触发器。在MariaDB 10.2.3之前，一个表只能为每个事件/定时组合定义一个触发器：例如，一个表只能有一个BEFORE INSERT触发器。

trans-unit.source: The event queue contains items, but the next activation is at some time in the future.

trans-unit.source: The event that activates the trigger. One of INSERT, UPDATE or 'DELETE.
trans-unit.target: 激活触发器的事件。其中一个 INSERT ， UPDATE 或 'DELETE 。

trans-unit.source: The event_name must be a valid MariaDB identifier with a maximum length of 64 characters. It may be delimited using back ticks, and may be qualified with the name of a database schema. An event is associated with both a MariaDB user (the definer) and a schema, and its name must be unique among names of events within that schema. In general, the rules governing event names are the same as those for names of stored routines. See Identifier Names.
trans-unit.target: event_name必须是有效的MariaDB标识符，最大长度为64个字符。它可以使用反勾来定界，并且可以使用数据库模式的名称进行限定。事件既与MariaDB用户（定义者）也与模式相关联，并且其名称在该模式内的事件名称中必须唯一。通常，控制事件名称的规则与存储例程名称的规则相同。请参阅标识符名称。

trans-unit.source: The events that can be compressed are the events that normally can be of a significant size: Query events (for DDL and DML in statement-basedreplication), and row events (for DML in row-basedreplication).

trans-unit.source: The examples we have seen so far are files that, even they can be formatted in different ways (blanks, tabs, carriage return and line feed are ignored when parsing them), respect the JSON syntax and are made of only one item (Object or Array). Like for XML files, they are entirely parsed and a memory representation is made used to process them. This implies that they are of reasonable size to avoid an out of memory condition. Tables based on such files are recognized by the option Pretty=2 that we did not specify above because this is the default.
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止,我们看到的例子都是文件,即使它们可以以不同的方式进行格式化(在解析它们时忽略空白、制表符、回车和换行),也尊重JSON语法,并且只由一个项目(对象或数组)组成。就像XML文件一样,它们完全被解析,并且用内存表示来处理它们。这意味着它们的大小要合理,以避免出现内存不足的情况。基于这种文件的表是通过我们在上面没有指定的选项Pretty=2来识别的,因为这是默认的。

trans-unit.source: The execution continued after the command in error because of the MAXERR option. Normally this would have stopped the execution.
trans-unit.target: 由于MAXERR选项的原因,在错误的命令后继续执行。正常情况下,这将停止执行。

trans-unit.source: The existence of UDFs are checked during the lexical analysis (in sql_lex.cc:find_keyword()). This has the drawback that they must exist before they are referred to, which was ok before SPs existed, but then it becomes a problem. The first implementation of SP FUNCTIONs will work the same way, but this should be fixed a.s.a.p. (This will required some reworking of the way UDFs are handled, which is why it's not done from the start.) For the time being, a FUNCTION is detected the same way, and returns the token SP_FUNC. During the parsing we only check for the *existence* of the function, we don't parse it, since wa can't call the parser recursively.
trans-unit.target: 在词法分析过程中会检查UDF的存在(在sql_lex.cc:find_keyword()中)。这有一个缺点,就是它们必须在被引用之前就存在,在SP存在之前这还可以,但后来就成了一个问题。SP FUNCTIONs的第一次实现也会以同样的方式工作,但这应该会被修正(这需要对UDFs的处理方式进行一些重构,这也是为什么一开始就不做的原因)。目前,FUNCTION也是以同样的方式被检测到,并返回SP_FUNC。在解析过程中,我们只检查函数的*存在性,并不解析它,因为wa不能递归调用解析器。

trans-unit.source: The fifth number is an IEEE 802 node number that provides spatial uniqueness. A random number is substituted if the latter is not available (for example, because the host computer has no Ethernet card, or we do not know how to find the hardware address of an interface on your operating system). In this case, spatial uniqueness cannot be guaranteed. Nevertheless, a collision should have very low probability.
trans-unit.target: 第五个数字是IEEE 802节点号,提供空间唯一性。如果后者不可用(例如,因为主机没有以太网卡,或者我们不知道如何在您的操作系统上找到接口的硬件地址),则用一个随机数代替。在这种情况下,空间上的唯一性无法保证。不过,碰撞的概率应该很低。

trans-unit.source: The first thread sends all changed buffers to disk. This is repeated as long as there are new LSNs added. The process can not loop forever because we have a limited number of threads and they will wait for the data to be synced.
trans-unit.target: 第一个线程将所有改变的缓冲区发送到磁盘。只要有新的LSN加入,这个过程就会重复。这个过程不能永远循环,因为我们的线程数量有限,它们会等待数据同步。

trans-unit.source: The first three columns of the search table must have a type of BIGINT for the 1st column (document id), INTEGER or BIGINT for the 2nd column (match weight), and VARCHAR or TEXT for the 3rd column (your query), respectively. This mapping is fixed; you cannot omit any of these three required columns, or move them around, or change types. Also, the query column must be indexed; all the others must be kept unindexed. Column names are ignored so you can use arbitrary ones.
trans-unit.target: 搜索表前三列必须有一个类型的 BIGINT 为第1列（文件ID）， INTEGER 或 BIGINT 的第2列（匹配权），以及 VARCHAR 或 TEXT 的第三列（查询），分别。此映射是固定的；您不能忽略这三个必填列中的任何一列，也不能四处移动或更改类型。同样，查询列必须被索引；所有其他必须保持索引不变。列名将被忽略，因此您可以使用任意名称。

trans-unit.source: The first three numbers are generated from a timestamp.
trans-unit.target: 前三个数字是由时间戳生成的。

trans-unit.source: The first three strategies have flags in @@optimizer_switch that can be used to disable them. The DuplicateWeedout strategy does not have a flag. This was done for a reason, as that strategy is the catch-all strategy and it can handle all kinds of subqueries, in all kinds of join orders. (We're slowly moving to the point where it will be possible to run with FirstMatch enabled and everything else disabled but we are not there yet.)
trans-unit.target: 前三个策略在@@ optimizer_switch中具有标志，可用于禁用它们。该 DuplicateWeedout 战略没有一个标志。这样做是有原因的，因为该策略是“包罗万象”策略，它可以处理各种联接顺序中的各种子查询。 （我们正在缓慢地发展到可以启用 FirstMatch 并禁用其他所有功能的状态，但是我们还没有。）

trans-unit.source: The first two syntaxes; X'value' and x'value, follow the SQL standard, and behave as a string in all contexts in MariaDB since MariaDB 10.0.3 and MariaDB 5.5.31 (fixing MDEV-4489). The latter syntax, 0xvalue, is a MySQL/MariaDB extension for hex hybrids and behaves as a string or as a number depending on context. MySQL treats all syntaxes the same, so there may be different results in MariaDB and MySQL (see below).
trans-unit.target: 前两种语法； X'value' 和x” value ，按照SQL标准，并表现为在自MariaDB的所有上下文的字符串MariaDB的10.0.3和MariaDB的31年5月5日（定影MDEV-4489）。后面的语法0x value 是MySQL / MariaDB扩展，用于十六进制混合，并且根据上下文表现为字符串或数字。 MySQL将所有语法视为相同，因此在MariaDB和MySQL中可能会有不同的结果（请参见下文）。

trans-unit.source: The fix for MDEV-12112 that was included in MariaDB 10.1.38, MariaDB 10.2.20, and MariaDB 10.3.12 changed the way that MariaDB distinguishes between encrypted and unencrypted pages, so that it is less likely to mistake an unencrypted page for an encrypted page.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.1.38，MariaDB 10.2.20和MariaDB 10.3.12中包含的MDEV-12112修复程序更改了MariaDB区分加密页面和未加密页面的方式，因此不太可能将未加密页面误认为是加密页面。
